main.name: Hello, I'm Fatan Aminullah
main.description: I am a web and mobile development engineer and I use react to develop pages
main.bio: Hello my name is Fatan Aminullah. I'm a 20 years old Software Developer. Now i'm working at PT. Anabatic Technologies as a Frontend Developer. I'm using ReactJS to build a Web Application and React Native to build a Mobile Application. I started my journey as a Professional Programmer in 2019, but I've started introducing myself to programming since I was in junior high school
